languages.text: Использовать весь потенциал Кьявы Гамма возможно, если нанести на ее поверхность огромную татуировку-электу — весь мир обернется грандиозной силовой катушкой.
It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.
languages.original_text: Использовать весь потенциал Кьявы Гамма возможно, если нанести на ее поверхность огромную татуировку-электу — весь мир обернется грандиозной силовой катушкой.

traits.locale_text: It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.
It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.
It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.
It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.
It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.

languages.text: Il est possible d'utiliser pleinement le potentiel de Kiava Gamma en recouvrant sa surface d'un immense électrotatouage : le monde entier sera ainsi enveloppé d'un transformateur de puissance grandiose.
languages.original_text: It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.

traits.locale_text: Il est possible d'utiliser pleinement le potentiel de Kiava Gamma en recouvrant sa surface d'un immense électrotatouage : le monde entier sera ainsi enveloppé d'un transformateur de puissance grandiose.

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマの表面を巨大なエレクトゥーで覆うことで、キアヴァ・ガンマの潜在能力をすべて利用することができる。つまり惑星全体が壮大な潜在能力の輪に覆われることになるのだ。
languages.original_text: It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマの表面を巨大なエレクトゥーで覆うことで、キアヴァ・ガンマの潜在能力をすべて利用することができる。つまり惑星全体が壮大な潜在能力の輪に覆われることになるのだ。

languages.text: 若要开发基亚瓦伽马星的全部潜力，需要用巨大的电镀体覆盖整颗星球表面，将整个世界包裹在巨大的势能线圈中。
languages.original_text: It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.

traits.locale_text: 若要开发基亚瓦伽马星的全部潜力，需要用巨大的电镀体覆盖整颗星球表面，将整个世界包裹在巨大的势能线圈中。

languages.text: Es posible utilizar todo el potencial de Kiava Gamma cubriendo su superficie con un enorme electoo. El mundo entero quedará envuelto en una grandiosa espiral de potencia.
languages.original_text: It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.

traits.locale_text: Es posible utilizar todo el potencial de Kiava Gamma cubriendo su superficie con un enorme electoo. El mundo entero quedará envuelto en una grandiosa espiral de potencia.

languages.text: Man kann das gesamte Potenzial von Kiava Gamma nutzen, indem man die Oberfläche mit einem riesigen Elektoo bedeckt — die ganze Welt wird in eine gigantische Potentia-Spule eingepackt.
languages.original_text: It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.

traits.locale_text: Man kann das gesamte Potenzial von Kiava Gamma nutzen, indem man die Oberfläche mit einem riesigen Elektoo bedeckt — die ganze Welt wird in eine gigantische Potentia-Spule eingepackt.

languages.text: Kiava Gama'nın yüzeyinin devasa bir elektrodövmeyle kaplanması hâlinde gezegenin tüm potansiyelini kullanma imkânı doğabilir. Bu durumda dünyanın tamamı dev bir salahiyet bobiniyle çevrelenecektir.
languages.original_text: It is possible to utilise all of Kiava Gamma's potential by covering its surface in a huge electoo — the whole world will be wrapped in a grandiose potentia coil.
